snippet.title: SEGA AGES Sonic The Hedgehog 2 & Puyo Puyo 2 | Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Challenge your friends to puzzle-battling action in Puyo Puyo 2, or take Sonic, Tails, and Knuckles on an epic journey to defeat Eggman in Sonic The Hedgehog 2. 

These iconic sequels join the SEGA AGES collection on the Nintendo Switch starting today!

https://segaages.sega.com
